TerminalWindowGUI - Class in com.zberman2.DataManager
Created by Zack Berman on 9/18/2014.
TerminalWindowGUI(Board) - Constructor for class com.zberman2.DataManager.TerminalWindowGUI
 
testAt() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.BoardTest
Tests that the board responds with the correct piece at a given rank and file, or null if nothing is there.
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.BishopTest
Test that it can only move diagonally to open spaces, with no spaces in between the starting and ending points
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.DukeTest
Test that it can only move 2 spaces vertically, horizontally, or vertically to open spaces, or to opponent's spaces on the board
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.KingTest
Test that it can only move 1 space horizontally, vertically or diagonally to open spaces on the board note that the canMove method does not determine if the king is left in check after the move.
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.KnightTest
Test that it can only move in L shapes to open spaces on the board
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PawnTest
Essentially the same as the test above, only now with the canMove function (which determines valid and legal movement)
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.QueenTest
Test that it can only move diagonally, horizontally or vertically to open spaces on the board with no pieces in between the starting and ending points
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.RookTest
Test that it can only move horizontally or vertically to open spaces on the board with no pieces in between the starting and ending points
testCanMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.ZackTest
Test that it can move vertically, horizontally or diagonally, and can jump pieces.
testFindPiece() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.MasterTest
Test that findPiece returns null for empty spaces, and the correct piece for occupied spaces
testIsAt() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Test that isAt will only return true if a piece is both located at an (x, y) coordinate, and is not yet captured
testIsCheck() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.MasterTest
Test that the Black king is in check on the checkmateBoard, but the White king is not.
testIsCheckmate() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.MasterTest
Test that the black king is mated on the checkmate board and that he is not on the stalemate board
testIsDiagonalMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Test that the isDiagonalMotion function only returns true if a destination is located diagonally away from the Queen
testIsHorizontalMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Test that the isHorizontalMotion function only returns true if a destination is located horizontally away from the Queen
testIsOpenDiagonalPath() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.BoardTest
Tests whether or not the Queen has an open path to a new rank and file
testIsOpenDiagonalPath() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Given diagonal paths, determine if the Queen can either capture or move to a space if there are no pieces in between the starting and ending points
testIsOpenHorizontalPath() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.BoardTest
Tests whether or not the Queen has an open path to a new rank and file
testIsOpenHorizontalPath() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Given horizontal paths, determine if the Queen can either capture or move to a space if there are no pieces in between the starting and ending points
testIsOpenVerticalPath() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.BoardTest
Tests whether or not the Queen has an open path to a new rank and file
testIsOpenVerticalPath() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Given vertical paths, determine if the Queen can either capture or move to a space if there are no pieces in between the starting and ending points
testIsStalemate() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.MasterTest
Test that there is a stalemate if it is the Black side's turn on the stalemateBoard, but not if the White side is up.
testIsVerticalMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PieceTest
Test that the isVerticalMotion function only returns true if a destination is located vertically away from the Queen
testMove() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.MasterTest
Test that the queen can only move to valid spaces on the board
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.BishopTest
Test that it can only move diagonally
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.DukeTest
Test that it can only move 2 spaces horizontally, vertically, or horizontally
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.KingTest
Test that it can only move 1 space horizontally, vertically or diagonally
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.KnightTest
Test that it can only move in L shapes where one leg is 2 sides long and the other is 1 side long
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.PawnTest
Test that the pawn can only move forward, that it can only capture 1 space diagonally, and that it can only move 2 spaces at once on its first move
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.QueenTest
Test that it can move diagonally, horizontally, or vertically
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.RookTest
Test that it can only move horizontally or vertically
testValidMotion() - Method in class com.zberman2.Tests.ZackTest
Test that it can only move diagonally, vertically, or horizontally
toString() - Method in class com.zberman2.Pieces.Piece
toString Method for a Piece Prints the color and (file, rank) position
